affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
cmb:
100/120/140/160
15
lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
name: crystal_maiden_crystal_nova

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing 50 damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite.
attrib:
DAMAGE PER HALF-SECOND: 50
HERO DURATION: 1.5/2/2.5/3
HERO TOTAL DAMAGE: 150/200/250/300
CREEP DURATION: 10/10/10/10
CREEP TOTAL DAMAGE: 1000
cmb:
115/125/140/150
9/8/7/6
lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
name: crystal_maiden_frostbite

desc: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
notes:
Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses.
The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.
lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
name: crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura

affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Channeled
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Lasts 10 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second).
Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 100 explosions.
attrib:
RADIUS: 835
EXPLOSION RADIUS: 300
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30%
ATTACK SLOW: 30
DAMAGE: 105/170/250
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 170/250/310
SCEPTER MOVEMENT SLOW: 50%
SCEPTER ATTACK SLOW: 50
cmb:
200/400/600
90
lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
name: crystal_maiden_freezing_field
